---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an enhancement for the starter kit
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is.

Example: "I'm always frustrated when I need to [...]"

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Which part of the system does this affect?**
- [ ] Templates (guide templates)
- [ ] Commands (AI guides or development commands)
- [ ] Examples (domain-specific examples)
- [ ] Documentation (guides, README files)
- [ ] Validation script (quality checks)
- [ ] Other (specify below)

**Use case**
Describe the use case for this feature:
- **Who** would use it?
- **When** would they use it?
- **Why** is it valuable?

**Example implementation** (optional)
If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, share them here.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

**Related domain** (if applicable)
- [ ] Web application
- [ ] API/Backend
- [ ] Mobile application
- [ ] Data science
- [ ] Other framework/domain (specify)

**Impact estimate**
How valuable would this be?
- [ ] Critical (blocking current usage)
- [ ] High (significantly improves experience)
- [ ] Medium (nice to have)
- [ ] Low (minor improvement)

**Willingness to contribute**
- [ ] I can implement this feature and submit a PR
- [ ] I can help test this feature
- [ ] I can provide more details if needed
- [ ] I'm requesting someone else implement this
